text: Valeriya Vladimirovna Demidova (; born 3 March 2000) is a Russian freestyle skier. She competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics in the women's halfpipe. ==World Cup podiums== ===Individual podiums=== * 1 wins * 5 podiums {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%;" !
